mapper.delete: DELETE FROM common.simple_texts WHERE cat_id = #{cat_id} AND text_id = #{text_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO common.news ( news_id, feed_id, title, text, author_user_id, creation_time, modification_time ) VALUES ( #{news_id}, #{feed_id}, #{title}, #{text}, #{author_user_id}, now(), now() );
mapper.update: UPDATE common.news SET title = #{title}, text = #{text}, modification_time = now() WHERE news_id = #{news_id}
